mapper.select: select count(1) from course where course_id = #{courseId}

select * from (select course_id as courseId,course_name as courseName, sd.dept_name as courseDeptName,course_type as courseType, su.nick_name as courseTeacherName, course_time as courseTime, course_score as courseScore from course inner join teacher t on course.teacher_id = t.teacher_id inner join sys_dept sd on course.dept_id = sd.dept_id inner join sys_user su on su.user_name = t.teacher_id) t where 1=1
and t.courseName=#{courseName}
